document.full_text: the changes, announced last week, are meant to curtail abuses of the system by immigrants and illegitimate schools, and would cut the number of visas granted by about 25 percent.
document.title: briefly: education: britain to tighten rules governing student visas
lines_and_colors: the changes, announced last week, are meant to curtail abuses of the system by immigrants and illegitimate schools, and would cut the number of visas granted by about 25 percent.
